comment: super nice professor, and her tests were super easy. had her for 1101 so content wasn't too hard and it was hybrid so we only met 2x a week and tests were online. tests were lockdown and camera but super easy if you just listen along in class
She was very friendly and caring and made class very enjoyable. I would recommend her—she is amazing!
Great professor, very kind. Attendance is mandatory. Usually 3 assignments per week, but they help a lot with exams. If you show up, you'll get a lot out of this class.
she is very kind and clear on grading never confused. understanding. i had her for 2 classes in a semester. was grateful for it, it was fun and simple as long as you paid attention. a generous grader
Very sweet lady, can tell she loves to teach. Her lectures can be a little boring but she does her best to make them engaging. beware of lots of homework, especially on InQuisitive.

Dr. Guitar is the best professor I have had as a psychology major. She is so attentive to everything she teaches and loves to hear everyone's opinions and thoughts. I would take her a million times again. Tests were always very easy and she provides clear study guides that include everything on the test.

Love Dr. Guitar had her for 2 semesters and is the sweetest most understanding professor! Currently taking gender in psych and took research methods and have an A in both classes! She makes learning interesting and fun! Attendance is credit so show up if you want credit! Discussion posts every week that relate to lectures! Just take her shes great!

LOVE HER! Dr. Guitar is such an amazing professor and I really enjoyed her class. I had her hybrid 33% so all of the work was online and we just went to class to go over ppts, 3 exams with webcam but if you just pay attention in class it will be a breeze i was able to make a 97% on the final!! I 100% recommend her she cares about her students.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Guitar is probably one of my favorite professors to date! She has clear and easy to understand lectures. Her grading agenda is also very manageable and predictable week-to-week. Her class was very interesting, as long as you put fourth the effort to understand material, you will pass with an A. 12/10 teacher :)

Dr Guitar is such a kind and caring professor! Her lectures are very informative and everything that she goes over in class is posted on D2L. There are a lot of group projects so be wary of that but her quizzes and tests are easy as long as you study! 10/10 professor would definitely take again

Honestly the perfect professor. I can't think of a single area she could improve in. Every lecture was informative, interesting, and interactive. Her lectures are also so efficient that there is time to ask in depth questions and explore subtopics on most days. Very understanding, responds to emails promptly, and communicates effectively.

If you are gonna take ANYONE for psych 1101 take her!! she's super nice and sweet and you can tell she cares about her students. Her tests and quizzes are super easy if you study and she posts these outlines of each chapter that you can study from which are very helpful. Overall, very nice prof and I would take the class again with her if I could.
